svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/28.1.2 Chrome/138.0.7204.243 Electron/37.4.0 Safari/537.36" version="28.1.2"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="MQeLC3HsgUnW-d4W0-h6"> <mxGraphModel dx="1247" dy="1039" grid="0" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="0" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" background="none" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="y0vg3gadU8QfcDdvQdoX-1" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">#! interpreter-path optional-arg</font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry width="200" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="y0vg3gadU8QfcDdvQdoX-2" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">interpreter-path optional-arg script-path arg...</font>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shadow=0;glass=0;arcSize=50;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="120" width="300" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="y0vg3gadU8QfcDdvQdoX-3" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;"><b>脚本文件</b> (位于script-path)</font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="-30" width="180" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="y0vg3gadU8QfcDdvQdoX-5" value="<b style="font-size: 14px;">在程序中调用execve()</b><div><span style="font-size: 14px;">execve(script-path, argv, envp)</span></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="220" y="10" width="200" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yCYVLbj9IytdPoXzzOVm-1" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="70" y="25" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="70" y="120" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yCYVLbj9IytdPoXzzOVm-2" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="160" y="25" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="160" y="120" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yCYVLbj9IytdPoXzzOVm-3" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="310" y="55" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="230" y="120" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yCYVLbj9IytdPoXzzOVm-4" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="360" y="55" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="280" y="120" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yCYVLbj9IytdPoXzzOVm-6" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;">(排除argv[0])</span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="80" width="50" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yCYVLbj9IytdPoXzzOVm-7" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;"><b>传递给解释器的参数</b></span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="90" y="150" width="140" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yCYVLbj9IytdPoXzzOVm-9" value="<font style="font-size: 20px;">提供给通过exec()执行的脚本的参数</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="185" width="340" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
